com.lambda
Class GameContainer

java.lang.Object
  com.lambda.GameContainer

public class GameContainer
extends java.lang.Object

The 'GameContainer' class is used as a container for a 'Game'. It provides options to change resolutions or fullscreen options.

Author:
alex
